If there are multiple results, please indicate them as XXX-XXX.

co_catalyst: XXX

evidence.pdf_reference: product without detectable CH 3 OH, H 2 , and CH 4 as secondary products.A control experiment showed no appreciable reduced C1 or C2 products were detected in the absence TiO 2 , BiOCl and (BiO) 2 CO 3 under sunlight irradiation.The gross yield in CO increased with the photolysis time (Fig. 6), and the total yield of CO of (BiO) 2 CO 3 obtained in the experiment after 8 h of continuous irradiation was 3.18 mol.In comparison, the total yield of CO of TiO 2 and BiOCl only was 0.05 mol and 0.42 mol,

about 0.5 mL of gas was continually taken from the reaction cell at given time intervals for subsequent CH 4 concentration analysis by using a gas chromatograph (GC-14B and GC8A; Shimadzu Corp., Japan).Control experiments showed no appreciable reduced C1 or C2 products were detected in the absence of H 2 O, CO 2 , photocatalyst or light irradiation, illustrating that H 2 O, CO 2 , photocatalyst and light irradiation were necessary for the photocatalytic CO 2 reduction.

In the photocatalytic reduction of CO 2 , 0.1 g of the catalyst was uniformly dispersed onto the glass reactor with an area of 5.4 cm 2 .The light source in the above photoreactivity experiments was a 300 W Xe lamp (Beijing Trusttech Co. Ltd, PLS-SXE-300UV).Visible light irradiation was obtained by using a 400 nm long pass glass filter to remove UV.The volume of the reaction

only was 0.05 mol and 0.42 mol, respectively. The carrier separation efficiency also affects the photocatalytic activity strongly.The higher PL peak intensity reflects the higher recombination efficiency.As shown in Fig. 7, the higher PL peak intensity of (BiO) 2 CO 3 less than TiO 2 and BiOCl.It indicates that the separation efficiency of photo-generated electrons and holes of (BiO) 2 CO 3 should be better than TiO 2 and BiOCl.The reason may be due to the large interlayer spacing (1.3675 nm).

Please find the category of Light_source and Lamp from the provided context which describe an solar chemical experiment.
The generation condition of the extraction is given: If Light_source is Solar or Solar Simulator, Lamp is always Solar Simulator.
